Title: La Petite Mort
Plot: Hank completes his biography of Ashby. Charlie is reduced to working at a car dealership. Sonja gives birth. Karen accepts a job offer back home in New York, forcing Hank and Becca to make painful choices.
GuestStars: Paula Marshall, Angus MacFadyen, Callum Keith Rennie, Carla Gallo, Ezra Miller, Michelle Lombardo, Nick Steele
